title: 3 Day Tour From Lima: Paracas, Huacachina Oasis & Pisco Vineyard
description: Experience the best of Paracas and Huacachina at a leisurely pace on a 3-day group tour from Lima. Itinerary highlights include a boat tour of the Ballestas Islands, a dune buggy ride through the desert oasis of Huacachina, a horse exhibition, and a vineyard tour in Pisco. This comprehensive excursion enables you to immerse yourself in local culture as you complete your Peru bucket list.
all_descriptions: Experience the best of Paracas and Huacachina at a leisurely pace on a 3-day group tour from Lima. Itinerary highlights include a boat tour of the Ballestas Islands, a dune buggy ride through the desert oasis of Huacachina, a horse exhibition, and a vineyard tour in Pisco. This comprehensive excursion enables you to immerse yourself in local culture as you complete your Peru bucket list.

reviews.title: Peru Hop
reviews.text: We loved our experience with peru hop! Especially our guide Jose Carlos ð he is so welcoming and knowledgeable. The dune buggyâs and sand boarding are a must do! Huacachina is beautiful and the food at Bananaâs is awesome. Peru hop is an easy way to see Peru and meet people. We hope to be back again soon!

reviews.title: Great experience, wonât be let down
reviews.text: Peru Hop was a great experience. Everything was easily explained so you could understand what the next few days were going to look like. JC was an amazing tour guide and we enjoyed our additional little things like the pisco class and karaoke with him. The bus had a lot of people, about 45, but the group never felt too big. My bf and I made new friends and had a great time blending with people from all over the world. Peru is gorgeous and as JC said, much more than just Machu Picchu. Iâm so glad we had the chance to explore Paracas and Huacachina with PH!

reviews.title: Great experience!
reviews.text: Really enjoyed this first part of my Peru hop bus tour! The pickup service is great and easy. My host RaÃºl was very kind and shared a lot of information about Peru. He helped you with planning your schedule and made sure everybody had lots of fun! Would definitly recommend!

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text: Really recommend using PeruHop. Super easy and comfortable buses with Starlink WiFi. Itâs more than just a coach, you get loads of experiences included (which you wouldnât do otherwise). Our guide, Luis, was brilliant! Super enthusiastic and proud about his country.

reviews.title: Great trip, weâll organised and super helpful guide Juancho
reviews.text: Great trip with Juancho - super friendly and very knowledgeable, he worked hard to make sure everyone had a great time. We really enjoyed our journey

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: The tour was fantastic, thanks for the organized and personal experience we got to see a lot of PerÃº with no stress and got to learn a lot from JuanJo he was one of the best I got to experience

reviews.title: Great Trip
reviews.text: Juancho was great was knowledgeable super nice and made our trip amazing.He went above and beyond to make our trip fun. Overall great trip

reviews.title: The best way to travel Peru
reviews.text: PeruHop was an excellent way of seeing the stops we wanted to get to. They made everything so easy and the tour guides were fantastic.

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.text: PeruHop was a great choice for us and Raul was such a brilliant guide! It was so handy and took all of the thinking and stress from the trip. The buses are comfy and we met some great people!

reviews.title: Must do! Hassle free way to see Peru
reviews.text: Our hop host Raul was amazing! He created a WhatsApp group to keep us all informed and shared tips along the tour. His energy and friendliness was contagious. Thank you for making our Peru trip so memorable
